data.event: Chatsworth, is a large suburb created in the 1960s to house the predominantly South Africa Indian population.

event.title: the 1940s, The Pegging Acts and the Ghetto Act were passed

data.event: In the 1940s, The Pegging Acts and the Ghetto Act were passed.

event.title: led to the Group Areas Act of June 1950

data.event: This led to the Group Areas Act of June 1950, which designated certain areas for the Whites and other areas for Indians, Coloureds and Africans.
Then in the early 1960s Chatsworth was planned, opening in 1964 and consisting of eleven neighbourhood units.
